value.name: The Glamorous Revenge
value.overview: Lin Muxuan, driven by revenge, transforms Xu Chaochao into the image of his mysterious "white moonlight" to draw out his enemies. Under the guise of running a beauty shop, their relationship evolves in a complex game of love and deception. As Xu Chaochao's charm wins over Lin Muxuan, secrets about her disguise and his revenge plot begin to unravel.
